attributes.action: ensuring HM Government remain vigilant in the ongoing political situation in Guinea Bissau and work pro-actively with future democratically elected governments there to prevent it becoming a transhippment hub for drug trafficking to Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Guinea Bissau having already been described by a senior UN official as a potential Narco-State. It would be in the British interest and indeed in the interest of the people of Guinea Bissau to have a more stable political situation than seems to exist at present given the recent deaths of thePresident, the Army Chief of Staff and an election candidate. Historical connection between Portugal and Guinea Bissau should be respected however the effects of drugs use in Britain means the possibility of a narco-state in West Africa will have far reaching effects throughout Europe.
